snippet: The group overran Musa Qala at least temporarily, local residents said, demonstrating the insurgents’ power in an area that American and British troops had long fought to keep out of their control.
abstract: Taliban members take over part of crucial area in southern Afghanistan province of Helmand, showing their rising power in part of country American and British troops had battled to keep out of Taliban control.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: The group overran Musa Qala at least temporarily, local residents said, demonstrating the insurgents’ power in an area that American and British troops had long fought to keep out of their control.

headline.main: Taliban Strike Crucial District in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Taliban Strike Crucial District in Southern Afghanistan
